name: Air Theme v2
description: AIR theme for MAL. A modification of Suffix's original theme, which seems gone for good.
additional_info:
1.1 version: Cleaner Air logo and background. Optimized for a 720p screen.

2.0 version: Adapted the background to the new size of MAL forums.

If you prefer a fixed background, you can edit the code yourself. Replace "no-repeat" with "fixed" at line 31 using the editor.
